name: Reaction Test (Rubber_Walrus)
description:
This is a reaction speed test application for use alongside a research project on flow theory in video games. Thank you for your interest in taking part!

The downloadable test application will take no more than a couple of minutes to complete, then there will be a sequence of short statements for you to answer with regards to your experience in the test application. In total, about 15 minutes should be needed to complete everything.

Thanks again!
